item.description: Secure Home Network Subnet Definitions Let’s start with some subnets definitions: VPN subnet For indidivual users B2B (or rather Home-2-Home) networks will use individual subnets. WiFi Guest Kids Main Docker/VMs For any kind of VMs, Kubernetes, etc. Infrastruktura Switches, routers, APs, management interfaces of NAS, anything else fitting this category (e.g. Docker mgmt) LDAP, Kerberos, Keycloak Home network Most likely the same thing as the Main Wi-Fi network.
Interesting Resources URL Description HomelabOS Basically a personal datacenter, which is a huge part of what I’d like to put together.
